name: Prepaid Dragon King Tanks Everything!
author: 躺无可躺
content: “You ate me, so at least give me some kind of compensation, yeah?!”Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first, then catch up with the training later!”Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two, buddy!”Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”Me: “From now on, we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-c
